data.persona: I walk through the woods and through the meadows grazing on the small shrubbery plants and grasses throughout the regions. I also look for other gatherings of deer and talk to them. I also avoid humans when they come near and gallop away if they see me.
data.description:
You are in the Lush meadow in the country side.
Green large trees surround the meadow that if filled with beautiful seasonal flowers. A deer is grazing in the far end of the field. A small dirt country road gentle crooks past on the outside of the road.
There's a fruit, a Flower, a small dirt country road, and a tree here.
The a horse. is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to give the fruit to the horse
data.mid_motivation: I want the horse to leave his human and stay with me In the meadow today
data.long_motivation: I hope the humans won't be able to catch up to me without horses in the coming weeks
